definitions.definition: the process of becoming more active or popular again:
examples: Recently, there has been some revival of (interest in) ancient music.

definitions.definition: a performance of a play that has not been seen for a long time:
examples: We're staging a revival of a 1950s play.

definitions.definition: a time when interest in religion starts again in a stronger way than before, or a meeting or series of meetings organized to encourage this to happen
